results:
Based on the search results, I found information about Polish audiobook adaptations and Polskie Radio productions, including a reference to "Diuna" (Dune). Here's what I found:

## Audiobook "Diuna" - Polski audiobook

The audiobook "Diuna" by Frank Herbert is available in Polish with "mistrzowska interpretacja Krzysztofa Gosztyły" (masterful interpretation by Krzysztof Gosztyła). This is described as "prawdziwa uczta dla zmysłów" with "perfekcyjnie zrealizowane nagranie" providing "bogatą warstwę dźwiękową i wysokiej jakości narrację" and nearly thirty hours of content.

## Polskie Radio - Teatr i Audiobooki

Polskie Radio offers podcasts and audiobooks, including "powieści i lektury szkolne czytane przez znanych i lubianych polskich aktorów" and content from "Teatru Polskiego Radia".

The platform provides "słuchowiska Polskiego Radia," "oryginalne nagrania Teatru Polskiego Radia," and "adaptacje dramatów scenicznych".

## Krzysztof Gosztyła - Lektor

Krzysztof Gosztyła, who narrates the Polish "Diuna" audiobook, has extensive experience in film, theater, and voice work, and his voice can be heard in popular titles including "Diunie," "Metro 2033," and Sherlock Holmes adaptations.

The search results show that while there is a high-quality Polish audiobook version of "Diuna" available, I didn't find specific information about a radio theater adaptation produced by Polskie Radio. The results mainly reference the commercial audiobook version narrated by Krzysztof Gosztyła, as well as general information about Polskie Radio's theater and audiobook productions.
